Saint Augustine, FL 32080

citations.narrative:
During inspection, USDA inspectors observed flaking paint on enclosure curbs adjacent to the water. Paint flakes can be
knocked off the surface by the general public or staff as they enter the water or interact with the enclosures and animals.
These paint flakes can enter the water and be ingested by the dolphins.
Facilities where animals are housed must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
To be corrected by July 2, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
Lemnique Wafer, Assistant Director n

narrative:
3.101(a)(1) 
   
Facilities, general. 
During inspection, USDA inspectors observed flaking paint on enclosure curbs adjacent to the water. Paint flakes can be 
knocked off the surface by the general public or staff as they enter the water or interact with the enclosures and animals. 
These paint flakes can enter the water and be ingested by the dolphins. 
Facilities where animals are housed must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
To be corrected by July 2, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Lemnique Wafer, Assistant Director n
